question.text: Alan is driving in very thick fog and the road surface is also rather damp. Alan is using fog lights as well as headlights. He leaves a larger gap than normal between himself and the vehicle in front. Later, a gutter drain is being unblocked and the pumping vehicle is obstructing the road on Alan’s side. Still further on, there are rumble devices on approach to a roundabout.
question.part: Why would Alan leave a larger gap between vehicles?

answer.text: His vehicle may need to stop suddenly
The other vehicle’s lights may dazzle him
The other vehicle may stop suddenly
His vehicle’s lights might cause glare
